The photo shows a man holding a sign wit: CHINA HELP ME BREATHE" in front of a burning building and road blockades with a Chinese flag attached. Graffiti on the roadblocks reads "Justice for Floyd."
Protests erupted across the US following: and the photo is related to these protests.
The photo has been doctored: and a reverse image search found the original photo published in a report by Portuguese TV channel SAPO 24.
